content: You can provide chunks of python code only. No explanation, no text
Give me a python puzzle involving % modulo operator. It should have at most 5 lines of code

a = 17
b = 5

result = a % b
result = (result + b) % b
result = (result - b) % b
result = (result * b) % b
result = (result ** b) % b

print(result)
Very good, give me another one

a = 9
b = 3

result = (a % b) ** (b % a)
result %= (b % a)
result %= (a % b)
result %= (a % (b-1))

print(result)
